#

## firstlevel 

```{r}
#| context: setup

library(psych)
data(bfi)

bfi$jibberish <- rowMeans(bfi[1:10], na.rm=TRUE)
bfi$gobbleyjook <- rowMeans(bfi[11:20], na.rm=TRUE)

dataset <- reactive({
  bfi[sample(nrow(bfi), input$sampleSize),]
})

```

## heya {.sidebar}

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(shiny)

sliderInput('sampleSize', 'Sample Size', 
            min=0, max=nrow(dataset),
            value=min(1000, nrow(dataset)), 
            step=100, round=0)
```

##

```{r}
output('bfiplot')
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

output$bfiplot <- renderPlot({
  
p <- ggplot(
  dataset(), 
  aes_string(x = jibberish, y = gobbleyjook)) + geom_point()

p

  })
```
